New Records: Zach Edey became the first rookie with a 20/10 game, shooting at least 90% from the floor.
Key Match Events: Zach Edey added 19 points to finish with a career-high 25 points in the second half.
Dennis Schroder finished with 20 points and six assists, shooting 7 of 15, including 2 of 7 from 3-point range.
Ja Morant got 25 points and nine assists on 10 of 22 shooting.
Post-Match Reflections: Zach Edey's performance can give the team some confidence as the Grizzlies look to bounce back and string a lengthy winning stretch together over the coming weeks.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Grizzlies lost 106-104 to the Brooklyn Nets.
The Grizzlies got 25 points and nine assists from Ja Morant on 10 of 22 shooting.
Zach Edey shot 8 of 8, including one 3, and added seven more rebounds and two blocks.
